concept.title: Starting, Stopping, and Restarting Your SenSage AP Deployment

conbody.p: This procedure stops, starts, or restarts the EDW and the other SenSage AP components on the host from which you are running Deployment Manager.

Deployment Manager manages specific SenSage AP files, which means any edits to these managed files are overwritten (usually when the service is started through Deployment Manager). For a list of files managed by Deployment Manager, see Appendix D. To start and stop your entire SenSage AP deployment:

ol.li: . From the Deployment Manager Dashboard, select the Services tab.

Above the Alerts and Health Checks, start or stop the entire deployment by selecting the Start or Stop button.If the Deployment Manager is running, you will see both the Restart button (green top and bottom curved lines) with the red circular Stop button; however, if any components in the deployment are stopped, you will see the triangular Start button instead of the red circular Stop button.
